data.name: Trainz Plus DLC - CSX Transportation - EMD SD80MAC YN3
data.detailed_description: The EMD SD80MAC is a six-axle, 5,000-horsepower, AC-traction diesel locomotive built from 1995 to 1996. Only 30 examples were ever built, all purchased by Conrail. Today, all are owned by Norfolk Southern. The CSX YN3 paint scheme was used until the units were repainted into the NS scheme in 2009.
data.about_the_game: The EMD SD80MAC is a six-axle, 5,000-horsepower, AC-traction diesel locomotive built from 1995 to 1996. Only 30 examples were ever built, all purchased by Conrail. Today, all are owned by Norfolk Southern. The CSX YN3 paint scheme was used until the units were repainted into the NS scheme in 2009.
data.short_description: The EMD SD80MAC is a six-axle, 5,000-horsepower, AC-traction diesel locomotive built from 1995 to 1996. Only 30 examples were ever built, all purchased by Conrail. Today, all are owned by Norfolk Southern. The CSX YN3 paint scheme was used until the units were repainted into the NS scheme in 2009.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
